headline: Europe Gambles It Can Save Nuclear Deal With Threat to Kill It
abstract: A risky strategy to keep the nuclear agreement alive could backfire. Badly. But no one else is even trying, Europeans argue.
lead_paragraph: BRUSSELS — Europe is gambling on keeping the 2015 Iran nuclear deal alive by threatening to destroy it — a risky, oddly timed strategy that could backfire badly, European officials and analysts say.
keywords: ARMS CONTROL AND LIMITATION AND DISARMAMENT
